start: ^alright! how much do you feel like clicking?
^i'm young and spry, let's play this like a VN

g-0: ^i know it's like midnight there, but...
^well, honestly, i don't have a but
^are you okay? is it cool if i vent?
^Yeah! Yeah, you're good! Catch me up on the happenings.
^i've not...... you  know been doing gg ggreat,
^i was really hoping this semester would be different but
^and i'm worried about you and your dumb boyfriend
^Have you been eating, pal? Because uhh...?
^like, i don't have the energy to cook, but i fucking miss it
^Pretty sure that's why Jack Nicholson put an axe through that door, actually.
^i could get takeout i guess buuuut there's only like two places nearby
^and the pizza place??? the guy there gets So judgey every time i'm like
^"oh ya i'd like a hawaiian without ham"
^i mean??? you charge for toppings, first off
^and a cheese pizza costs the same as a hawaiian
^it's math!!! it's not my fault your menu's a damn
^I swear there's no hurry here, but... is there something on your mind? Specifically?
^Only, I know you can chatter when you're nervous, and...
^there's nothing Specific, it's more that like... everything feels wrong
^i mean iiii don't want you thinking you're on the hook to fix things
^Fixing things is lame, we can do that later.
^You're venting. Find something to be grumpy about.
^Sometimes I just want to pick you up and shake you like a shitty little racoon.
^I'll be back in a bit, alright? Dunno, we might be...
^But I'll be around! I mean it! Just message me if
^Hey, wait, what time is it there?
^Still early-ish, right? Can you maaaybe go get some groceries? For me?
^Or... for you, rather, not me. The groceries are for you, but...
^Yeah, okay, that's your quest for today.
^You can keep chatting my way if it helps! I'll catch up when I get back. <3
^cool in that case your boyfriend's a dick
^....god, it's no fun when you're not around
g-1: ^the outside. the sun. the bright. the people. the loud. the
^apparently you can buy stuff in person????
^and you bring it home yourself??? instead of waiting on the post??
^wait what the fuck? that's so convenient
^so i must brave the cold light of day
^and clean my laptop with a brick please and thank u
^ty ty i'll be here all week
^it took me like hhhalf a hour to even make it down here
^and i missed the bus, of course,
^i mean,, you know i was joking before, right?
^i dunno!! some part of my dumb little lizard brain just wants me to sit in the dark and play shitty video games
^and every time i'm like...... sunlight? exercise?? literally just stepping one foot outside????
^my fight or flight reflex bursts in to the room like one of those funky little possums
^it goes all :V :V :V :V and then hhSsSsssSsses and shreds through my curtains and drinks all my wine
^i mean, how did you manage it, man?? for real?
^like, that whole time, i knew something was up
^and it got in the way of Everything
^i couldn't function? so i felt........ kinda broken, tbh
^but i knew it wasn't my fault! because you're sick! you're doing your best! of course it's not your fault!
^and everyone told me it wasn't my fault
^and i rly thought that i believed that it wasn't my fault
^aaaaand then? then i get this diagnosis,
^and for the first time, it fits
^it fits everything, checks every box, solves every puzzle,
^it's like we're in the parlour room at the end of the murder mystery
^and my psych is this sweet little old lady in a cardigan who definitely just accused me of killing a guy
^it's like?? i'm hit by this,, fuckin' freight train of a realisation
^that it... really isn't my fault that i'm like this
^and it never was? and i could finally, truly believe it
^yes, yep, exactly, that's a v good example of what you aren't meant to be doing
^i wish i knew, is the point, yea :s
^i can point to a dozen little moments like that... that really did feel like big steps
^shit went back to normal (bad) a week later
^but i did get better? eventually? so i guess something was changing
^yeah? i mean... i'm definitely not.. always on the up and up
^i'm kind of all over the place, honestly
^oh, it's a fucking scatterplot of a graph
^but as long as you're trending upwards, right?
^so... look for the things that help
^i had a friend who just needed to get his hormone levels fixed
^and not even in a trans way
^dumbass gets a shot in the leg every month and suddenly he can get out of bed
^i don't think there's any one answer
^maybe the secret is just... to keep on stumbling around in the dark
^at least until you figure out the Real secret
^well,,, the cure, you know? the 'cure'. the thing that works for you
^it's easy for me to say, i know, just
^maybe you just gotta keep looking until you find it?
^sorry, you didn't come here for a big ol speech about mental health, huh?
^especially one that..... doesn't fix anything at all
^i mean i'd fuckin' love a cure here don't get me wrong but
^it's kinda nice knowing there's a light at the end of this particularly shitty tunnel?
^oh!! eheh okay well i'm v glad! <3
^and my bus is here! finally! so you kept me busy!
^i'll let you go then but uh
^tell me when you make it home!
^and make some pancakes! you deserve it!!
g-2: ^okay look i know ur still 'chatting' with your 'boyfriend' or 'whatever' but
^i'm vibrating out of my skin over here
^i swear the dude at the front of the bus can hear me buzzing
^he keeps looking my way, tryna scope me out???  i'm not up to anything spicy, homie! ain't no toys over here !!!!
g-3: ^hit me up tho it's been way too long
g-4: ^like we're fine, crisis averted and all that
^but i almost talked to sam there lmfao
^i guess she's off Living Her Life so we're good b
g-5: ^yes! it's been Such a long time! how've you beeeen?
^midst of a global meltdown! but ooootherwise,
^but uni's going really well! i'm almost done with my degree!
^oh right!!!!! i saw that on insta haha
^what's ur major again?? is it still the same one? i'm so sorry i have the woooorst memory
^and the boys are all over me lmfao
^you won't Believe what i've been up to though renny
^me n a friend moved into the Cutest little place in bk
^idk it's some tax write off for the landlord probs but
^we moved into this brownstone??? and it's the Cutest little place
^it's next to this?? adorable little pizza shop that i Swear is run by anarchists
^the girl there is Constantly stoned haha
^i mean i don't have proof about the anarchist thing yet, but i'm working on it
^a friend hooked me up w this internship
^it's amazing but also nbd and i'm so lucky for getting it haha
^but yes god i'm glad you're ok though
^it's been Too Long, i've missed you
^i mean... idk if you're ever down this way? but
^o shit hang on dude i'm about to miss my stop
g-6: ^I'm so sorry that took so long.
^You... talked to Sam, huh? Fuck, okay.
^'google it dumbass' Yeah, well, fuck you.
^Did you get your groceries? Did you make it home okay?
^It's still dark outside there, so you're obviously not asleep yet.
^If you need some space, that's totally okay! Just let me know! But, uh
^did make it to the bus! did talk to sam
^yeah yeah no you're good, i gotcha
^i'm just coming down from the tail end of a
^honestly, i've got those things down to an art
^might be ready to take this act on the Road babey
^i Hate knowing how far i've fallen behind everyone else
^just in terms of.... life. growth. everyone has their degrees and they're working and they're getting better and ??? ? ? ?
^Hey, man, hang on. I don't want to interrupt, but,
^I mean, that's dumb, and everyone takes things at their own speed, this isn't high school,
^Let me just triage for a second. Are you okay? Like, really? And where are you? Did you make it home?
^i'm in like? some fuckin park? i kinda just got off the bus and
^No, no, hey, stop that. You're okay! You're okay.
^I'm sorry, I really didn't mean to interrupt. I... let myself get kinda worked up and worried, I guess, but...
^What's weighing on you? Is there anything you want to talk about?
^nah don't worry dude i'm  definitely okay now
^i mean, again, i feel very particularly dumb
^i couldn't even make it through a bus ride?? ? ?? ? ? like
^that's not a hard thing to do. it's barely even a Thing To Do??
^you just sit there! you put your headphones in and listen to three friends (coworkers) crack jokes about just much worse things have gotten in politics since the last episode (yesterday)
^and then you push the button and it makes the bell go ding! and you get off the bus and thank the fucking driver and you go get groceries and you get on with your life and
^it's just really fucking hard to accept that
^oh, yep, no, i just totally failed today
^i messed up, and there's no extra step orthing i can change??
^i can either go home, and admit that...... yeah, i'm still broken,
^and that everyone else has gotten better and moved on with their lives and i'm stuck here
^I mean, recovery can be... you know,
^i know! i know. it's a scatterplot, i've heard
^so yeah! i can go home? and admit all of that?
^but if i just keep sitting here on this dumb cold bench
^then i don't have to admit to anything
^Fuck, I'm so sorry, man. I... shouldn't have taken that call.
^of course you should have, i'm glad you did
^i know we can get into it here
^but i think i'm just gonna have to process all this? in my own time
^i know i've gotta go home, i'm not dumb
^I'll be here, okay? For as long as you need me.
^ttttt t t t t t thanks, man
g-7: ^i have a v short postscript to last night's extra dumb adventure (tm)
^iiii had a friend offer to drop around some food later today
^so that'll keep me going for a day or two
^i dug through the cupboard, and i guess i've still got some baking stuff??
^and yeah i know it's lunch time
^but i haven't eaten, and i'm out of fruit juice, so this legally can't be called brunch

credits: ^outside was created as part of the NanoRenO 2020+ game jam, in collaboration with rachel morgan.
^this port was built on ink. you can find the original renpy version here.
^and if you ever need to chat... i'm right here on twitter <3.
